projects.name: Secure Credential Manager Extension
projects.description: A browser extension to securely store private credentials with auto-fill capabilities. Supports Web2 (Google/Email) and Web3-based login, with authorization confirmation for sensitive actions.

projects.name: Bitly Clone - URL Shortener
projects.description: A full-stack application where users can shorten links, with a temporary link display feature and backend management of link redirection.

projects.name: College Website Redesign (Hackathon)
projects.description: Led UI/UX design and development for a modern landing page showcasing BCA, BBA, and BHM courses. Merged Indian traditional themes with modern scroll animations using GSAP, Locomotive.js, and Three.js.

projects.name: Self-Destructing File Sharing
projects.description: A PHP-based secure file sharing system with expiring links, auto-deletion, encryption, and optional password protection. Admin panel for tracking usage.

projects.name: Virtual Eyewear Try-On
projects.description: Web app allowing users to upload photos or use a webcam to try on different glasses virtually. Built with PHP and WebGL for realistic fitting.

projects.name: Phone-Controlled Car
projects.description: A WiFi/Bluetooth controlled smart car prototype. Controlled via a smartphone app for movement and control.

projects.name: Triopedia - YouTube Channel
projects.description: A Bengali-language channel focused on tech content, storytelling, UI/UX design, roasts, and awareness videos with cinematic editing and narrative depth.
